definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Silver-headed men sit around kerosene heaters.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭銀髮的男人圍坐在煤油暖氣機。

sentences.english: Inside our house, the air-condition blow off warm wind keeping us warm and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在屋裏，暖氣機吹着暖氣，是我們溫暖舒適。
